acupoints.name: Hall of Impression (Yintang)
acupoints.notes: Calms mind; also used for sinus pressure/headache.

acupoints.name: Shoulder Well
acupoints.location_hint: Highest point of shoulder muscle midpoint
acupoints.notes: Releases shoulder/neck tension; avoid in pregnancy.

acupoints.name: Union Valley
acupoints.location_hint: Hand web between thumb and index finger
acupoints.notes: General pain/stress modulator; avoid in pregnancy.

acupoints.name: Great Surge
acupoints.location_hint: Dorsum of foot between 1st and 2nd metatarsals
acupoints.notes: Liver qi regulating; used for mood and tension.
